title: Group to discuss illegal immigration in meeting here
body:
The Irish Lobby for Immigration Reform, a New York group, is holding a town-hall meeting from 7:30 to 9:30 
tonight at the Hyatt Regency Hotel at Penn's Landing in Philadelphia.

The meeting will address various congressional proposals to deal with illegal immigration. The hotel is at 201 S. 
Christopher Columbus Blvd. Admission is free.

Gaiutra Bahadur
